channel.title: Gson Versioning on Simple Solution
channel.description: Recent content in Gson Versioning on Simple Solution

item.title: Java Gson versioning support using @Since annotation
item.description: In this Java Gson tutorial we learn how to @Since annotation to support versioning during serialization or deserialize JSON with Gson library. (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({}); How to add Gson to the Java project To use the Gson library in the Gradle build project, add the following dependency into the build.gradle file. implementation group: 'com.google.code.gson', name: 'gson', version: '2.8.7' To use the Gson library in the Maven build project, add the following dependency into the pom.
